tracks.text: Red light rolls right over humans. Green light rolls left over avatars. Rakuro and Sunraku, Towa and Pencilgon, Kei and Katzo, Rei and Psyger-0.
A green tower stands behind a fountain in the middle of a red-bricked town. Day turns to night. Red text, Shangri-La Frontier.
Sunraku stands in the Inventoria
Pencilgon and Katzo stand back to back in the ruins.
A mail bird lands on Psyger-0's arm.
Akane and Creecure run at night through the ruins.
Ether Reactor, Operations Unit, Golden Crystal sphere, Idols
Professor in library
Psyger-100 in town
Emul runs from SF Zoo
Bilac hammers in a forge. Amariys sips coffee. In Nephilim Hollow, Rust and a man stand on a roof near satellite dishes.
A computer sits in the Utopia reference room.
Sunraku flies through the crystal nest fighting scorpions.
Sunraku flies through the Ruins, fighting golems.
In Nephilim Hollow, Sunraku stares up. He dissapears. Kingfisher and Crimson Twinewing fly around and fight. In the red mecha, Rust screams.
A spiky golem in the ruins.
The Gatekeeper's arms glow blue.
The Golden Crystal scorpion spreads its pincers.
Akitsu Akane, a blue haired ninja girl, makes hand signals.
Sunraku stares up at a giant mountain of metal trash.
Pencilgon swings a golden spear.
Katzo red fist punches the Gatekeeper.
Psyger-0 holds a sword and takes her dark form.
Sunraku wears a mask and holds crystal arm guns.
Clouds cover the moon.
A shadowy wolf lunges from the darkness.
Text, 34, Run, Fueled by Impatience
He grabs Emul's head and shakes.
The RNG Goddess shows middle fingers.
Sunraku falls to the floor.
He launches a map
He equips a carrot
Gilta Brill is a pair of 3 foot long crystal gun gauntlets.
He leaps through the door and closes it.
Eighthold at day time
Stat screen. Luck 104, Vitality 3
He thinks of Katzo and Pencilgon
Animalia
Psyger-100
Psyger-0
Professor
Mailbird flies
Psyger-100 sits in Schwarz Vulf HQ
A pigeon carries mail to Psyger-0
Psyger-0 reads the letter
She walks to the door and trips over her own foot.
At the Saiga residence.
Rei lies on a futon in her tatami matt room
She blushes and rolls around, flailing. Above her, a wall scroll reads "Constant Progress"
In the traditional japanese garden, water falls into a souzu bamboo shoot and pours out.
The ruins of past glories
Sunraku looks at an error message
He holds Gilta Brill
Cannot equip weapon due to insufficient stats.
A mail bird falcon flies overhead
He sees a pile of junk
He breaks
He shouts at a hmountain of metal parts. Steam emerges.
A claw raises. A pylon drives into the ground. A circular saw rises hundreds of feet in the air.
Text, Area Boss, Overdress Golem
Boosts
Junk falls towards him.
He leaves an outline of himself behind him.
The golem swings an arm at the outline.
The outline flickers while Sunraku skates away.
He brakes, then engages boat leap.
A hand swings around to him
He leaps off of parts and pipes, reaching a platform near the top.
In a red toned town with a green sword shaped tower in the background, Psyger-0 stands under an awning.
Players side eye her and walk past hurriedly
Text, 36, The saint's holy water
Text, and so, the new chapter of his life begins...
Item shop sign, Sold out of Saint's Holy Water, Restock Date TBA
